text: Ferenc Sebő (born February 10, 1947 in Szekszárd) is a Hungarian folklorist and musician, best known as the bandleader for the Sebő Ensemble, a band that produced many future stars, including Márta Sebestyén (later of Muzsikás). The Sebő Ensemble was one of the best-known groups of the Hungarian roots revival in the 1970s. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian musicians Category:21st-century conductors (music)
title: Ferenc Sebő
